item.title: Unit Test your Architecture (and more) with ArchUnit
item.description: Explore the power of ArchUnit and learn how to bolster your software architecture testing. Link to article: https://goatreview.com/unit-test-architecture-with-archunit/

item.title: Middleware-Based Exception Handling in ASP.NET Core
item.description: Unlock the full potential of your ASP.NET Core applications with our definitive guide to middleware-based exception handling. Learn how to gracefully manage errors, boost your application's resilience, and protect against downtime with practical, easy-to-follow strategies Link to article: https://goatreview.com/middleware-exception-handling-aspnet-core-guide/
